'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This lighthouse is the pride of Rauataian engineers, constructed around a massive pillar of luminous adra. Unfortunately, that also made it a prominent target for [[Eothas]] in his travels across the Deadfire.

==Points of interest==
* This is a single chamber, with the pillar in the center and the naga standing guard over it (see [[A Distant Light]] for details on how to access it).

==Characters==
* [[Sugaan]], leader of the naga incursion at Hasongo
